text: The men's 800 metres event at the 1999 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Göteborg, Sweden, at Ullevi on 30 July and 1 August 1999. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Nils Schumann ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| James Nolan ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Paweł Czapiewski ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 1 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
